structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Legislative findings -- Statutory authority for regional wastewater commission.

text.section: KRS 65.8901 to 65.8923 shall constitute full and complete authority for the creation of a regional wastewater commission and for carrying out the powers and duties of the commission.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch.98, sec.1, effective June 8, 2011.
